title: New: Celeste – Born Again
body:
Having featured on a [TIEKS single](https://www.

youtube.com/watch?v=VZXm39V68WE&app=desktop) earlier in the year, 19 year old Londoner (originally from Culver City, CA) **Celeste**, steps out with her debut solo track, _Born Again_. Self-written and produced by Tev’n, it’s an exploration of her soulful, pensive vocals, set against a nostalgic electronic backdrop. For a first release, it’s mighty confident, and will undoubtedly see her making inroads in all the right places. Check out Born Again below.
